name: Ramen Oil Pecking Simulator
description:
Ramen chill time is coming

You have just finished eating your favorite ramen and are taking a post-meal break. Lacking the time to do anything else, you pick up your chopsticks and quickly go to your bowl of ramen. You then spend the next hour dragging the oil floating in the bowl until the ramen soup cools down.

Streaming Terms and Conditions

We give permission to distribute videos using this game on YouTube and other platforms and to monetize them through our video distribution platform partner program.
We would appreciate it if you could include a link to the Steam store page in the video summary section of your distribution.
